post.description:
Deprecated: use ['PUT /v3/baskets/{basketId}/lines'](#operation/saveLinesV3)
Use this endpoint to add multiple lines

put.description:
Use this endpoint to save multiple lines at once.
When no lineId is prodvided, then a line will be added. (expect if the same sku is already added with the same price)
When a lineId is provided, then the line will be updated.
Use this endpoint to delete all lines at once.

post.description: Use this endpoint to add a voucher (promo code) to the basket. The voucher will be added as payment, or added to the basket as a line to be sold.

Process a basket by sending it to the Prices-and-Promotions-Engine, validating vouchers and creating giftvouchers.

Lines

The response will contain a convertAction on the line.
The Prices-and-Promotions-Engine can update lines (quantity) or add/delete lines (in case lines of a split eg 2+1).

Sku

For sku we expect the full data for the sku:
  • sourceId
  • brand
  • season
  • productGroup
  • gender
  • tags (not in use)
In case of a product unknown in Tilroy sourceId can be provided, but it will not be taken into account.

Promotions

On line level the reference to the promotion is provided.

Loyalty

Loyalty for this basket expressed in both value and points.

Vouchers

Contains all vouchers added by the customer.
Source system provides the code and Tilroy will respond with: • type
• valid
• amountOpen: amount open on this voucher
• error: error messages for this voucher Possible values for type: • advance
• discount
• unique
• loyalty
• giftvoucher
• creditvoucher Possible error values: • CompletelyUsed: no amount open on the voucher
• NotSold: voucher is known but is not active yet
• Cancelled
• NotActiveYet
• Expired

Gift voucher

Source system will provide the amount and Tilroy will respond with: • reference
• webcode Once Tilroy assigned reference and webcode in next basket JSON’s we expect the reference and webcode to be filled or Tilroy will generate a new one.

Get all possible delivery services for the given payload.

**Payload**
You either need to provide enough data for Tilroy to be able to determine the delivery services ('address', 'priceTotal', 'products' & 'shop') or provide the id of an entity where Tilroy can fetch those properties themselves ('orderId', 'quotationId', 'basketId').
For 'sku' and 'shop' either fill in the 'tilroyId' or the 'sourceId' (you could use 'number' for shop as well).

**Response**
'productDelivery' and '-Service' are nullable, in case when either is not available or implemented.
'price' inside these objects is also nullable for the same reasons.

The service will return all dates in the given 'monthRequested' or in 'dateRange'.
When dateRange property is used, monthRequested is no longer required (and is ignored)

**Payload**
You either need to provide enough data for Tilroy to be able to determine the delivery services ('address', 'priceTotal', 'products' & 'shop') or provide the id of an entity where Tilroy can fetch those properties themselves ('orderId', 'quotationId', 'basketId').
For 'sku' and 'shop' either fill in the 'tilroyId' or the 'sourceId' (you could use 'number' for shop as well).
In 'deliveryService', 'reference' and 'tilroyId' refer to the same property. TilroyId is deprecated but still supported.

**Response**
The dates returned are in ISOdate format, but do not regard your locale. They will always be in the 0-time offset ('Z').
'price' is nullable, depending on the implementation.

requestBody.description: The payload containing all order data to base the response on.

requestBody.description: The payload containing all order data to base the response on.

get.summary: get a basketId for an abandoned cart
get.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a basketId for an abandoned cart

post.description:
Creates a session to indentify the context: who is creating/updating baskets for what shop, language, channel, ...

The response will contain a session header that should be used on all request, to identify the context.

requestBody.description: The payload containing all token request data to base the response on.

post.description: Imports a basket. This operation is asynchronous.

requestBody.description: The payload containing all basket data to import

post.summary: Set the loglevel for the service.

sourceId.description: Reference of the basket in the source system

languageCode.description: language of the basket (NL, DE, EN, FR)

vouchers.description: Vouchers added to the basket by the customer

externalLoyalty.description: Loyalty for this basket is external or not. When a Gezinsbond card is added, for example, externalLoyalty should be true.

externalLoyaltyReference.description: Reference for the external loyalty. Basket API will not perform validation in a 3rd party system for this reference.

description.description: Overrides the discount reason description/code in the basket line

combinationId.description: An id to make sure certain lines stay combined and prevent reorganization of these lines.

paymentRequestId.description: The id of the payment request.

isUsed.description: only show in voucher lines (type code = "V")

sourceId.description: Reference of the customer in the source system

remainExact.description: keep the current basket as is. Do not add collect lines, annulations, etc.

needInvoice.description: set and invoice for a customer

deliveryAllowedFrom.description: Date determined by customer that states a preferred start date for delivery. Not related to 'delivery.date'.

priceTotal.description: total amount of the order, including VAT

price.description: total amount of the order, including VAT

description.description: can be used to add a custom description to the line

sku.description: required when creating a line, to identify the product

barcode.description: Barcode of the gift voucher in the source system. For new gift voucher the barcode and amount is provided by the source system. Use the VoucherAPI to create giftvouchers in status new, to use here.

combinationId.description: An id to make sure certain lines stay combined and prevent reorganization of these lines.

quantity.description: Line multiplier. Can be updated when lines are split or merged.

amount.description: loyalty for this basket in amount

points.description: loyalty for this basket in points

returnIncentiveId.description: the returnIncentiveId for this loyalty (source of the points)

actionId.description: the actionId for this loyalty (source of the points)

monthRequested.description: must be in format of YYYYMM

tilroyId.description: Tilroy id of an order (only used in return, not for updating a basket line)

lineId.description: Tilroy id of an order line (only used in return, not for updating a basket line)

code.description: Status of the order line: C = Cancelled, D = Dispatched, I = In transfer, L = Finished, M = Click&Collect confirmed, N = Unreserved, Q = Requested, R = Reserved, S = Sold, X = Not available

sourceId.description: Reference of the basket in the source system

convertAction.description: Based on prices and promotions basket lines can be updated or inserted and deleted in case of a buy and get that splits the lines (eg 2+1). N = None, U = Update, I = Insert, D = Delete

sellPrice.description: sell price of the sku, includes discount in case of promotion

vouchers.description: Vouchers added to the basket by the customer

type.description: Indicates the type of the voucher (promo, gift, credit, loyalty)

amountOpen.description: Amount still available on this voucher.

valid.description: Indicates of the voucher is valid

error.description: error message in case voucher is not valid

giftVouchers.description: Sale of gift voucher. Tilroy will respond with an assigned reference barcode and webcode.

actionId.description: Reference to the action applied to this line

buyAndGetId.description: Reference to the buy and get applied to this line

customerPriceId.description: Reference to the customer price applied to this line. Also known as exceptionalPriceId.

discountReasonId.description: Reference to the discount-reason applied to this line

lineDiscountId.description: Reference to the line discount applied to this line

returnIncentiveId.description: Reference to the return incentive applied to this line

setId.description: Reference to the set id applied to this line

tilroyId.description: Reference of the shop in Tilroy

sourceId.description: reference of the shop in the source system

tilroyId.description: Reference of the shop in Tilroy
Reference of the assignee in Tilroy

sourceId.description: reference of the assignee in the source system
Reference of the sku in the source system

tilroyId.description: Reference of the sku in Tilroy

sourceId.description: Reference of the sku in the source system

quantity.description: the number of skus to add to the basket

Tag.description: Tags of this sku, used for Prices-and-Promotions definition

code.description: Code of the error, assigned by Node or the developer.

message.description: More information about the cause of the error.

Error.description: The error object returned by the service

headerSessionToken.name: sessionToken
headerSessionToken.description: the token with the session information

pathLineId.name: lineId
pathLineId.description: the id of the basket line. example: '1_P'

lineType.name: type
lineType.description: the code of the type of the basket line

queryFields.name: fields
queryFields.description: Comma-separated list of all fields you want returned in the result. All other fields will be omitted.

basket.description: The basket JSON in the body of the request

customer.description: The customer to add to the basket

delivery.description: The delivery JSON in the body of the request

deliverServicesCriteria.description: Payload to base available delivery services on

loglevel.description: The logging level type in the body of the request

paymentRequest.description: The information to add a paymentRequest

updateBasketBody.description: Body with values to be updated

createBasketBody.description: Optional body with values for the creation of a basket

skuLine.description: The information to add an sku to the basket

linkedObject.description: The linkedObject to add to a basket line

giftVoucherLine.description: The information to add a giftVoucher to the basket

updateLineBody.description: the quantity and prices for the specified line

parkComment.description: the comment to be added when parking a basket

tagsBody.description: the tags to be added to the basket

additionalInfo.description: the comment to be added when adding additionInfo a basket

addLinesBody.description: the body to add multiple lines

textLine.description: The information to add a text to the basket

voucher.description: The information to add a voucher to the basket

TilroyApiKey.description: The API key to identify the tenant
TilroyApiKey.name: Tilroy-Api-Key

XApiKey.description: The API key of AWS to identify who is performing the requests
XApiKey.name: x-api-key
